author: abha kirty
comment: BEWARE ITS A FRAUD One of my friend has suggested that snapdeal is giving 80 to 90% off on beauty products like MAC. Being a aware citizen i thought that it's not possible for brand like MAC to give such a huge discount....am using the MAC products since last 5 years but still i got confused after seeing the prices of beauty products which is 2000 plus and having huge discount... After deep analysis i found that its Mac or MAC where as the original name is M.A.C. Donot go for this site... Its a fake.. Fake... Fake

reply.author: Snapdeal.com
reply.content: Hi Abha! Products sold on our website are 100% genuine. Our sellers are authorized vendors of the product. If you have any concern with the product, you can email us at apphelp@snapdeal.com & we'll help you out. Thanks! Avi

comment: The worst app I have ever seen... They just message that ur return request remain closed... N we have shipped back ur product.... Even when it's clearly mentioned in my return request that  the product seems to be used one..... What worst one can do to devalue the customer... author: Roses Anacletus
comment: I got my blackberry 9720 and it doesn't support whatsapp and now I want to return it and replace it with a better phone but snapdea customer service doesn't recognised my number. The same Humber I use to place all my order,  why is this happening. Please I wanted to send that phone to my mom so we could communicate. Please please please fix this or at least have someone talk to me. I am really frustrated right now and it's been more than 72hours. Help please. Today is 26 of February 2018 and this is the 2nd time I am reminding Snapdeal to please refund or replace my blackberry 9720 please and I promise never to buy from Snapdeal ever. I can't get through to their customer care and I have sent emails I mean lots of emails please replace it or refund my money please please please please please please
